page.title: 16Swaythling
page.content: This area is largely residential; some properties dating back to the end of the 19th Century but the majority having been built during the inter-war years by the council or, in some cases, by housing associations. The principle shopping area for this district is at Portswood but there are small parades of shops in Burgess Rd. & Swaythling High Road. The latter contain food stores, post offices, hairdressers and a laundrette. The main problem in using these parades of shops is that they do not have parking facilities and so congestion is a constant problem. This area is not well served with recreational facilities and what does exist is often uncared for and subject to vandalism.
